sentences.english: Children can't help fidgeting about if they're made to sit still for too long.
sentences.chinese: 兒童如果被迫久坐會情不自禁地把身體扭來扭去。

sentences.english: I want the wind to blow your shade to hug me.
sentences.chinese: 我情不自禁這風要將吹拂你的身影來擁抱著我。

sentences.english: In short, I can’t help feeling that the gold bugs are right.
sentences.chinese: 簡而言之，我會情不自禁地覺得黃金信徒們是正確的。

sentences.english: Prince Andrey could not help smiling as he glanced at Captain Tushin.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈公爵望了望上尉，情不自禁地微微一笑。

sentences.english: My little sister immediately wanted to pick some to take to my mother.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹情不自禁，欲伸手摘花，送給媽媽。

sentences.english: I can't help but love you.
sentences.chinese: 我還是情不自禁地愛着你。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming was so excited, couldnt help but rush on with oda embrace to celebrate their victory.
sentences.chinese: 小明興奮不已，情不自禁衝上臺與小田擁抱慶祝勝利。

sentences.english: She couldn't help screaming at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 她情不自禁地朝那陌生人尖叫了起來。

sentences.english: All the animals laughed and laughed. The spider worked and worked.
sentences.chinese: 動物們笑得情不自禁，而蜘蛛仍然忙來忙去。

sentences.english: We can"t help but compare today"s players with yester year.
sentences.chinese: 我們情不自禁地把今天的球員和往昔的球員比較。

sentences.english: Cheerful people familiar, suddenly feel eyes couldn t help but kiss.
sentences.chinese: 開朗突然覺得眼前人眼熟，情不自禁的吻下去。

sentences.english: After Chihu cemetery , we can not help but go inside.
sentences.chinese: 經過了慈湖陵園，我們情不自禁地走了進去。

sentences.english: He can't help himself because his brain is programmed to do this.
sentences.chinese: 男人是情不自禁，因爲他的大腦天生就是幹這個的。

sentences.english: Hearing at the story, I can't hunter myself weeping.
sentences.chinese: 聽這個古代事件時，我情不自禁地流起眼淚。

sentences.english: Hearing at this story, I can't help myself weeping.
sentences.chinese: 聽這個故事時，我情不自禁地流起眼淚。

sentences.english: An exclamation of joy escaped from her lips.
sentences.chinese: 她情不自禁地發出了一聲高興的叫喊聲。

definition: eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to get excited/passionate/aroused to passion/to fall in love/on heat (of animals)
